articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: European gas prices jump 10% as strikes get underway at major LNG facilities in Australia - CNBC
articles.description: European gas prices moved sharply higher on Friday as workers at Australian natural gas facilities went on strike.
articles.content:
European gas prices moved sharply higher on Friday as workers at Australian natural gas facilities went on strike, prompting fears that a prolonged halt to production could squeeze global supplies.

articles.title: G20 Summit: EU supports India’s efforts for joint communiqué, backs Ukraine in war | Mint - Mint
articles.description: European Council President Charles Michel even added that they would support India even it remains 'firm and united' in backing Ukraine in the face of Russia’s aggression.
articles.content: A day after indicating their disapproval of the draft text for the joint communique scheduled for release at the New Delhi G20 Summit, European Union officials on 8 September said they support Indias… [+3210 chars]
